job.title: Software Engineer (Early Startup)
job.description: Overview Looking for a Lead Developer/Software Engineer to help build out our platform and grow our developer team. This position comes with a lot of decision power, responsibility, and control over the technical aspects of our business. Being an early hire and in charge of such a major part of the business, applicants should expect to be treated as and act as a co-founder. Applicants should not only be willing to work in a startup environment, but thrive in one. The best applicants will be able to wear many hats and will be a "jack of all trades" in modern tech development as we build and iterate with various technologies. This position will report directly to the CEO. Responsibilities 1. Oversee, develop, and code the technical side of the SaidThat platform 2. (As the team scales) Manage, hire, and build out SaidThat's development team 3. Build iOS & Android apps along with a corresponding website 4. Help inform the company on the best technologies and practices to use 5. Work with designer/agency to implement their design, flow, and layout for the platform Requirements 1. A bachelor's degree or higher in computer science 2. Proficient in Javascript, CSS, & HTML (Previous experience in Node, React, and React Native is a major plus) 3. Leadership experience 4. Previous experience developing smartphone applications Compensation The position will be paid at the most competitive salary we can offer given our initial funding. Additionally, applicants that are a good long term fit can also expect to be awarded equity in the company on a traditional vesting cycle.
